title: Staff Scheduling Optimization
description: Developed solutions for optimizing staff scheduling and resource allocation in a fast-paced international environment, improving operational efficiency.

title: Data Research and Analysis
description: Conducted comprehensive data research and analysis to identify ideal customer profiles, contributing to business development strategies.

title: Volunteer Workshops and Camps
description: Organized workshops and camps to raise awareness about environmental issues, including global warming and recycling, in collaboration with Peace Corps volunteers.
